articles.title: Ibrahima Konate: Liverpool close to sealing transfer after triggering RB Leipzig defender’s release clause - The Independent
articles.description: The centre-back is set to feature for France at the U21 European Championships this summer
articles.content:
Liverpool have triggered Ibrahima Konates £36 million release clause at RB Leipzig and are prepping the official announcement of the signing with all formalities completed.

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Pandemic takes centre stage in Macron's South Africa trip - Eyewitness News
articles.description: Emmanuel Macron and Cyril Ramaphosa will hold talks and then head to the University of Pretoria to launch a programme to support African vaccine production, a project backed by the European Union, United States and World Bank.
